title: • API controllable webcam project
text: murtis built an API controllable webcam project called witness and is using it as part of an automated robotics testing procedure - very cool.

title: • Building-a-nanny-bot
text: Robert is documenting the process of assembling a build of the Nvidia Jetbot on our forums, with the intention of turning it into a “nanny bot” to help amuse his daughter. Childcare for the next generation!

title: • Swift on Raspberry Pi
text: @wlisac published Docker images to run Swift on Raspberry Pi and other ARM devices. There’s also a hello world sample project to get you started.
